title: Weekly Community Meeting
description: Join us for our weekly community meeting where we discuss ongoing projects, upcoming events, and community needs. This is an open forum for all community members to share their thoughts, concerns, and ideas for improving our neighborhood.

title: Food Distribution
description: Weekly food distribution for community members in need. Please bring ID and proof of residence in Wayne County. Fresh produce, canned goods, and household essentials available while supplies last.

title: Job Skills Workshop: Resume Writing
description: Learn essential job skills including resume writing, interview techniques, and professional communication. This hands-on workshop will help you create a compelling resume and prepare for job interviews. Laptops provided, or bring your own.

title: Community Garden Volunteers Needed
description: Help maintain our community garden that provides fresh produce for our food distribution program. All skill levels welcome. Tools and refreshments provided. This is a great opportunity to connect with neighbors while making a positive impact.
location: Community Garden - Behind UWS Center, Lyons, NY

title: Senior Citizens Support Group
description: Monthly gathering for senior citizens to connect, share experiences, and access resources specifically designed for older adults. Light refreshments provided. Transportation assistance available upon request.

title: Back-to-School Supply Distribution
description: Free school supplies for K-12 students in Wayne County. Backpacks, notebooks, pencils, and other essential supplies available. Pre-registration recommended but walk-ins welcome while supplies last.

title: Financial Literacy Workshop
description: Learn essential financial skills including budgeting, saving, credit management, and banking basics. This workshop is designed for all skill levels and includes practical exercises and take-home resources.

title: Community Clean-Up Day
description: Join neighbors in beautifying our community! We'll be cleaning up parks, streets, and public spaces throughout Lyons. Lunch provided for all volunteers. Families welcome - activities for all ages.
location: Meet at 2 Broad St., Lyons, NY

title: Holiday Meal Distribution
description: Free Thanksgiving meal distribution for families in need. Complete holiday meals including turkey, sides, and desserts. Pre-registration required. Volunteer opportunities available for meal preparation and distribution.

title: Youth Leadership Program Kickoff
description: A program designed to develop leadership skills in teens aged 13-18. Participants will learn about community organizing, public speaking, project management, and civic engagement. Lunch and materials provided.
